column3: “First hit and bam I was back in early 90s Seattle. Loved this strain back then and love it even more now. I suffer from what I call the mechanic" like insomnia! I've asked every dispensary to give me there "guaranteed" knock you out strain and none has worked for me. Not until I got my hands on good ole big bud. Great body buzz uplifting just basic sit on the couch relax and watch TV till you pass out smoke! It rela...”"

“I started smoking Big Bud for the first time a few months ago as a concentrate and I'm speechless. I've smoked A LOT of different indica strains over the years and I have to say all of the info that I read here on leafly was spot on.  Holy cow batman! As many of you can attest to having insomnia, (for me it is due to debilitating back pain) is a constant battle with sleep or lack thereof. I've been dealing with insom...”
“This is the best go to sleep" strain i've ever smoked. Not really the thing you smoke with friends.

column1: One smoke of this and you will go to sleep
column2: like a baby! It helped with my muscle tensions to. Liked this smoke a lot but a bit to heavy for everyday-smoke.”"

column3: “dont inhale that long trust me u been warned”

“I picked up 7G from World Of Weed for 40$ of a variation of this strain called Cali Big Bud" and it has quickly become one of my favorite strains of all time. The batch of Cali Big Bud i have is a little leafy but just coated in snow white trichomes. Yields huge dense trichomy buds. Great for Depression
column5: and if you just wanna experience some heavy Euphoria. Definitely reccomend. One Love

column3: “Do not under estimate this strain Big Bud, it's a powerful indica with huge buds that can put you to sleep and ease your pain, the high is very strong and will dissipate after a couple of hours. Perfect nigh time cannabis, highly recommended.”

“I've been sick with the flu and feel like crap. About 20 minutes after I vaped this I swore that I had been cured of the flu until I started talking and realized I have no voice. So I'm going to have to say that doesn't completely cure the flu but it does make you feel like you don't have the flu which is almost as good as curing it.”
“big bud was awesome, i was instantly high off a few hits. I felt very stoned relaxed sleepy, i would have to say night time strain didn't have any knee pain . thank you harvest of tempe”

“This is a relatively affordable strain that does everything for me that I need marijuana to do. It relieves anxiety and eases tension, it increase my appetite and helps me to go to sleep. It's pretty perfect frankly! The flavor is not particularly enticing- but it's not bad at all either.”

“I have fibromyalgia and it helped relax my back today better than any other strain. It provides a mellow, happy feeling. My morning anxieties washed away. And definitely sleepy. Good for relaxing days at home and before bed. The medical value for me is priceless!”

“Pretty good bang for the buck! took a few hits, watched the new Dave Chappell standup on Netflix, laughed like a moron until I passed out. 
WARNING: HAVE MUNCHIES AROUND!! I ate a huge meal about 20 minutes before medicating and within about 15 minutes of smoking it I was pigging out again lol.. enjoy!!”
“I've had shoulder pain 24/7 for a three days. This helped so much.”
“vancouver island,bc,canada. good strain cheap 8.50 /g smells a lot”
“It's a Indica n Stays true to what it's suppose to do.”

“I have 4 Big Bud Plants growing outdoors right now and they have gotten 7 foot tall and about 5 foot wide!The stalk is crazy , fatter than my wrists which arent small.
I should get at least 5 pounds out of the 4 plants and even more if the reviews about huge yeilds are true.”

“This is the fourth time I smoke marijuana. For the first three times, there were no significant effect on me. I almost felt nothing for the first two times, I smoked it on a pipe and I don't think my techniques were right. Anyway, the third time when I smoked it with my friend, I felt heavy-headed and pretty much that was all.

However, this time, when I smoke it out of a bong, the effects were dramatic and out of th...”

“At first I am an over expressor of emotions and talk so much I forget about eating, and well get very anxious eating. Then thathatsollowed by the negativity in my head. Warmed up the machine took a puff and instantly no negativity but positivity replaced those thoughts. Instead of shying away from my objectives. Now I understand with happiness rather oh I have to do this or that. . This helps me feel better regardles...”

“A tasty weed, a fresh and sugary flavour. Lot of pollen on the leves and buds, nice to smell (better once grinded).
A powerfull and lenghty high which makes people talkative, happy and creative.”
“Called Humboldt Big Bud" and seemed very mellow from beginning to end.”"

“I actually thought that this strain wasnt bad considering the Taste was yummy and the Yield is fantastic and the High Wasnt That bad at all not as Weak as they Say... Better than Mids... I wouldnt say its top shelf but its A good strain i would recommend People To Grow, and try at least once... 7 stars for taste AND yeild With a moderate stone...”

“Big bud is a good all-around bud I wouldn't call this top shelf, something in the middle. not too harsh, its some what smooth at first. this gives me a little pick up in small amounts,  smoke too much and I'm out”
“total stress reliever. great for pms!!”

“I think anyone who compare this cannabis cup winner with regular smoke should realize they do not have the true Big Bud. Come on. Do you honestly think you have a true champion but it only is of Mexican brown quality. Its a great strain and sorry to.those who were screwed but research is key to get what you want. Don't purchase skunk 1 its extinct. Big Bud was a clone only strain so find out what male had been used t...”

“You know that Beatles song, 'Hello, goodbye'? Well that about sums this up.
I approached this delicious looking, plump nugget with the excited feeing of HELLO! and a smile on my face. This shapely, glistening lady tested at over 26% THC at The Greenhouse, a local and favorite of dispensary mine. Surely this beauty is bred to be one of their strongest strain, so carpe diem seasoned patrons!
A very nice, light smelling...”

“I got this one at a bargain price so I don't know how much care was taken in cultivating it.  I guess my review may be tainted with the quality of the buds themselves, but I tried it so I get to review it.

If I could use one word to sum up this smoke it is blah".  It just felt like I was smoking some kinder
column4: gentler mids that somebody decided to name.  It does have a nice
column6: lemony taste when smoked which is...”"

column3: “Picked this up at AZ Organix! Super tasty, sleepy, happy! Stop in there and check their cut out!”

“Love this strain! It took over my garden and produced amounts I didn't think were possible. It helped with my chronic pain and insomnia where other so called medical strains have failed so often. I would suggest everyone at least give this one a try.”
“O my o my big buds for me and my medicating issues .. love the buds total body relaxation and all over highness is well achieved.. shuuu I forgot that I forgot that I was high as the sky”
“Probably one of my favorite strains, relieve joint inflammation and tension. Calms my anxiety and in general is nice for a relaxing high that isn’t overwhelming”

“Very hard to wake up the next day; slept like a brick. Every time I smoked it I missed my morning classes. Terrible for video games, I lost all concentration and motivation to continue playing. Perfect for movies and tons of munchies.”
“this strain has become my favorite strain. it gets me to sleep so quick and just gives you a very nice euphoric feel. definitely a 9/10”

“Flufffyyy 💚 Picked up 1/8th from AZ Organix last week, just to give it a try. These dense, woodsy smelling buds proved useful for physical pain and relaxation, helping me stay asleep all night. A sleepy strain for sure. The campfire flavor gave me mad dry-mouth during the day though, so remember to keep water handy!”

“Very hard to wake up the next day; slept like a brick. Every time I smoked it I missed my morning classes. Terrible for video games, I lost all concentration and motivation to continue playing. Perfect for movies and tons of munchies.”

“This weed when smoked was like a full-blown trip. It effected me in every way possible, and made me lay on a couch for 8 hours staring at a wall imagining colors, figures, disfigurations, shapes, you name it. I think what happened was my brain was like resetting or something idk it was freaky though. 5/5 too potent my friend had two 5 gram nugs of this shit .”
“this strain has become my favorite strain. it gets me to sleep so quick and just gives you a very nice euphoric feel. definitely a 9/10”
“It has a pretty good smell and taste! Something you need to smoke!”

“Awesome Strain for Sleep Problems but not really long. 
The Effect apears not so massive anymore after a bit longer usage... 
but that is like nearly every strain, but here i recognized it very exactly.
But anyway.... perfect strain for sleeping for my opinion.
The Smell, Taste and Smoke is really one of the best i´ve ever had. Remembered me a bit on Strawberry Cough what the taste belongs...”
“Probably one of my favorite strains, relieve joint inflammation and tension. Calms my anxiety and in general is nice for a relaxing high that isn’t overwhelming”

“Big bud is my best bud, favorite strain. Usually one hit is all I need to feel like I've just had an hour massage and hot bath. Lifts my mood, quells anxiety, and knocks me right out during bouts of insomnia.”
“Great for sleep and has low anxiety which is great because I have PTSD and anxiety. Keeps me laid back.”
“Very tasty great pain relief. I got it as concentrate took couple hits night back was hurting real bad sat back relaxed no more pain and passed out deserves more than 3.9”

“Awesome Dope !!!
It is the chilled Weed I've ever smoked.”
“I hace a really fast pased high stress job. This is one of my strain of choice for relaxing at the end of the day, 10/10 would do douring a bubble bath!”

“Organic, mellow body high with a nice euphoria that combine to make a very relaxed buzz...
+a gentle cerebral tingle 

Sun grown=earthy flavor (if you find the right organic outdoor grower everything tastes good!)”
“Pretty good stuff. I really enjoy the smell it has. Like before, but definitely after I smoke it. I smell it in my clothes and in the air and it smells great! Very dense as well”

“Approached the Big Bud with low expectations. Mine looked like a common indica but smelled like a dirty laundry basket. Lots of trichromes were present and flowers were very sticky. The flavor from my vaporizer was nondescript earth" and a bit acrid. Reminded me of wet

column2: the high was great; like falling backward into deep snow. There was a tsunami of relaxation that just gently washed away ...”"

column3: “mind bending indica. real nice taste and smell.”

“Very powerful first hitter, coughed a lot.. I have Asthma so, I cough a lot as it is.. This thing was piney when I bought it.. Dried up fast.. Felt like shake real fast.. I put it in a mason Jar, air tight.. Still.. I think I bought too much at 1x. I wanted to buy a cheap ounce this might be one of the low one's. Only tried 1x very faint memory. Hope the effect's are right. It was a little to long. I just know when I...”

“This is one of the best strains to help you sleep well if you're currently dealing with sleeping problems. Not neglecting to mention is helps relaxing your muscles, like getting out of a hot tub sort or muscle relaxer.”

“Maybe it is because I just prefer sativa's, but I didn't really like this strain. I almost fell asleep after a couple of bong rips and  it gave me dry as duck eyes and a cotton mouth, what I didn't have from strains for a year or so.

Also be warned about the smell of this strain, it's just pure earthy as I couldn't find anything more in it and it smells HARD AS HELL. Had my room ventilated for 2 days to get away fro...”
“Very tasty strain if grown in the right conditions”
“Everything that this site has the side effects as is perfect. I'm shmoking Big Bud now for the first time and it earns my 5 stars. Highly recommend.”
“Great for sleep and has low anxiety which is great because I have PTSD and anxiety. Keeps me laid back.”
“Everything that this site has the side effects as is perfect. I'm shmoking Big Bud now for the first time and it earns my 5 stars. Highly recommend.”

“This is hands down the best bud I've had for getting to sleep, and it's hard to find that specific characteristic. 

Take a few hits, wait 10 minutes, feel it kick in, then ZZZZZ.”

“this is the best smoke for me so far. it puts me in a perfect relaxed mood, some people say it will make u sleepy, and its a couch locker but harvested early 60 instead of 80 days the effects are completely different, its more uplifting and makes u very social and RELAXED, no paranoia no amnesie. perfect mood, makes me happy like peter pan !”

“As I continue my search to find a strain for insomnia I will say this didn’t help. It was very relaxing but just not enough to put me to sleep. I was able to chill and not think as much.”
“Pretty good stuff. I really enjoy the smell it has. Like before, but definitely after I smoke it. I smell it in my clothes and in the air and it smells great! Very dense as well”

I live in a place where different strains are hard to come by and very difficult to find out what the stain is.however if you find some Big Bud definetly pick it up. It gives me hallucinations sometimes if I smoke a lot. After an hour after smoking I'm ready to sleep. Also make sure you have some good with you because you will get very hungry even if you've had a big meal befor...”
“Very tasty strain if grown in the right conditions”

“My system gets to a high tolerance for cannabis pretty fast so the need is to switch back and forth between different strands of cannabis with enough cbd and high levels of thc to meet my needs for anti depressant, pain relief and the occasional just for the heck of it! Bug bud was a recommendation by one of the great bud tenders at The Green House. I almost turned the suggestion away (glad I didn't! From the first t...”

“I used this strain for my chronic back pain, muscle spasms for over a month. It was an overall good strain. Nice piney scent with citrus undertones. Overall, it was not the most potent of strains, but definitely better than just 'fair'. You can find this strain through more than a hand full of seed banks.”

“Migraine pain 6; nausea 4 when I medicated after getting home from work. I don't think the couple of reviews I read nor the descript on this site do this strain justice! Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. Head high nice & strong without any anxiety/paranoia (a must). Body high very nice as well. I could go to sleep or go jump on my husband! Don't remember taste as this was a couple of days ago. High...”
“Great for Pain”
“Really nice high”
“Nice scent, good smoke, out of a pipe and or water pipe, relaxing, mellow, sleepy, happy high. Good for the end of the day, or beginning of a lazy weekend.”
“Tastes great, very relaxing.”

“I had low expectations for the effect and taste of this strain due to some of the reviews here. Grew this outdoors in a 10 gallon pot. Easily yielded 1lb despite disposing of a couple of colas due to rot. 

Smell has some earth, but more lemon and pine than I'd expected. Flavor matches the taste - it's very lightweight, none of the overly damp earth tastes. It's very pleasant, and while it's not one of the newer dess...”
“What a smell like a candy of some kind. nice taste not long lasting but really good  no less CDXX Boutique great job”
“This bud has great nugs all over the plant, but is not always consistent in potency. Good medicine for the non habitual user.”
“I love this strain. Mellow body high, that allows me to go about my business.”
“sleepy and euphoric”

“Let me qualify by saying this strain for me is a night time evening strain.  It is too much for me during the day...already like napping too much.  With that said I grew some HUGE plants in my back yard.  One of them was well over 10 feet tall.  I do understand why they say BIG BUD.  The buds become so heavy if you did not stake them the entire plant would probably just fall over from weight.  I got the variety teste...”
“Big dense buds covered in crystals and lots of red hairs. Its definitely has a wood earth scent but smokes smooth and has a sweet after taste. A good indica strain, would smoke it again.”
“Great for Pain”
“the name tells it all. Super Big heavy buds. theses big buds are so sticky better have a grinder ready. I used my Bubbler to medicate and have been couch locked since.”

“Very Light green you can smell the sage and grass herbal smell through the bag. This stinky smelling green with red darkened pistols give the best stony high. It helps me with my appetite loss as it's a killer for that. It's a woody smoke which you don't get often with heavy hitters. Big time relaxer increases my thoughts for sleep. Taking away the pain can allow me to use yoga to stretch and get a good nights sleep ...”
“This stuff is amazing!”

“I grew big bud over the summer outdoor the plant survived very wet and windy periods as well as a mould outbreak but the end result is worth it.
The high is more sativa than indica with very powerful medical benefits”

“Big bud doesn't create euphoric kind of high. After tried it for many times, the main effects that I experienced are relaxed and focused. This type of strain alters your perceptions of time and motion, and it relaxed you. I always have a really deep sleep the night after smoked big bud.”

“This is by far the best cure for my pain and hunger problems spent two hours making fried gluten free zucchini, new mexican ranch style and greek style, with fried peanut oil. It helps me relax ,when its time to goto sleep and puts me on track with my life. I recommend this if you are unmotivated and sore. Try something new or do something creative. --Chill_Panda ¶:D”
“only had it in a co2 oil cartridge....but I liked it . seems to help with stress 👍”

“A really good strain, tried it with my friend outside took some hits from the bong and was off. I was laughing so godamn hard, especially because my friend rolled the worst joint and dropped it, all fell out and wasted most of his weed. Probably never laughed so hard. But after that I was chilled out on my couch barely able to play GTA V without stopping and staring at something...”

Very hard to find strains that don't couch lock me and overwhelm me. I am a light weight with a heavy tolerance, so it comes to me that; strains that don't couch lock, but provide pain relief and doesn't make me sleepy just relaxed. Great for days to sleep in or get your bearings str...”
“Loved it. Left me feeling uplifted and calmer.”

“I really like the strong indica effects nice relaxing night time high the taste isn't the best but not bad either I have it in concentrate firm shatter and I'm not in love with this prossesors but I can tell the strain shines threw”
“most definitely best bud for getting to sleep”
“good”

“I don't like this strain very much. It didn't make me happy. At one point my friend said something slightly negative and I thought about it for the whole night and had a sad night. 

This strain is a lot like being drunk alone.”

“I absolutely love this strain! I have high stress and anxiety that completely diminishes after just a few hits. Of course you can overdo it and become very sleepy as it is a very strong Indica and is one of the strains that made GDP (my favorite strain to date). Smoke a little bit before work and it makes all the problems go away without making me sleepy. Good wake and bake with a caffeine beverage of choice as well....”

“Exstreamly dank purple buds these leaves are short with hair more towards the top. Large christmas tree buds and the vape is so thick it might fall instead of rise. It's a very euphoric heavy weight experience. Earthy and light skunky textures very nice taste its strong effects hits your head and then your body within minutes as you keep rising its a nice relaxer or a perfect exercise assistant.”
“Having trouble sleeping? This strain will put you down for the night! This worked better for me than any sleeping pill, melatonin or liquor! Very calming, very mellow flavor as well”
“not that good”

“Not to impressive. Just your average headies. Nothing stood out about this bud. The high was alright, but not anything special. It looked really nice and smelt good, but the high did not live up to the buds appearance. Not sure if i would pick up this bud again.”
“Buds were GIGANTIC”
“Flavourful, very peppery in flavour and scent. Heavy indica effect, and great for bed time.”

“Big bud got me feeling dizzy at first, but a comfortable dizzy. After I got really euphoric and just laughed at everything. At the end i got really tired and sleepy, and had a quite dry mouth. Still really good one, love it!”
“If you want a chill, relaxed strain this will do it. I don't do indicas ever but i was curious about it. Definitely different indica high than in the past ive had. Crazy head and body high”

“Pretty damn nice bud, but still not the best one. I felt like all my body parts fell apart and my brains and mind were a separate part of my head. Really good to spend your evening with. It also made everything kinda fun :-)”

“Amazing full-body high. It didn't take much (as a daily smoker) and I was in da couch, melting. 

Anyone else find this strain leads to arousal?”
“Horrible odor.”
“old skool kinda smoke quite relaxing with an uplifting head high.”

“I enjoy this strain. It is good for just chilling out. Great stress relief, also helps anxiety pretty well. It won’t necessarily knock you on your ass, but it is still worth trying. It’s also pretty good for sleep.”

“This is my Indica bae. Not for social smoking, this strain puts me down within minutes, not a creeper. This is great when you can find it. The flavor reminds me of Afghani with a complex earthy aroma.”

“Great strain for a euphoric and heavy hitting indica effect with sugary light tasting flavor. I grew this in a greenhouse with supplemental LED, insulation airflow and heat in a fabric pot with organic soil and nutrients.”
“not bad, I sleep - cured well - taste good”
“Really enjoyed a classic yet unique high thats been perfected over literally decades... Love this strain...”

“Migraine pain 7 all day; nauseated only a lil when I medicated round 1730 or so. Takes less than 5 min to kick in. Pain/nausea gone. Body high perfect. Head high good & strong. Think this one must be Sativa dominant. Vaped a lil too much & had some paranoia going on (4). Starting to wear off 2 1/2 hours later. Highly recommend for daytime use; especially for any pain/nausea. Just watch how much you use to avoid any a...”
“Not bad - I sleep”
“very dense resinous buds but the high isn't too overwhelming:)”

“Grew this as my last crop. I've been getting compliments from every person who has tried it. Big Bud is a must try strain. Leaves you feeling relaxed and nice little cerebral blanket envelopes you into bliss.”

Smell has some earth, but more lemon and pine than I'd expected. Flavor matches the taste - it's very lightweight, none of the overly damp earth tastes. It's very pleasant, and while it's not one of the newer dess...”
“i love this bud in growing and smoking.people need to have this strain worth your money and time!!thx”
“Good to smoke at the end of a night. Nice chilled out high, nothing too heavy. Quite leafy, not particularly crystaly. Earthy sort of smell and taste.”

“Fantastic strain. :D
I have this genetic to at least two years, and I'll keep it for a long time. Sativa hybrid with Indica, great for cultivation in Brazil”
“Wasn’t crazy about the flavor. Definitely an Earthy taste. This is a great relaxant. Took away most of my pain & anxiety. This is not a head high. This is a body relaxant. Good good Indica strain.”
“nice and funny high..medium strong strain..true relax”
“Earthy light flavor. Full body high. Does help with sleep. Nothing too special. Does slow you down a little, mentally that is.”

“It's really balanced and nice. It has a lovely and easy come up, which takes about a few minutes to reach its maximum. It makes you feel cosy and relaxed. Super stuff to chill!”
“The description above completely underestimates this bud. This is a good plant even when you can afford the nicer strains". I equal it to white rhino.”"
“A very powerful strain. It's quite potent. This thing just makes you wanna sit down and chill tf out. If you wanna smoke this, do it with some friends.”

“I grew big bud over the summer outdoor the plant survived very wet and windy periods as well as a mould outbreak but the end result is worth it.
The high is more sativa than indica with very powerful medical benefits”

“Used to get big bud a lot a few years ago dont see it now most Big bud ive has been average however i got a bag 1 time and it was 1 of the best smokes ive had smoked weed for over 10yrs on n off so its definitely worth a try”

“Powerful sleep inducing effect from a heavier dose. I had a bad experience smoking too much at once with feeling “too high”. Didn’t touch it for a while and then came back to it. Just a pinch will do now...”

“really nice stable relaxed easy going and even little bit concentrated high. good for relaxed days. after little smoke you can still focus and not get wasted. really really one of the best strains. good grow nice buds.”

I work with computers all day, and this strain really helped my eyes feel better, must be the awesome CBD percentage in it !! Two ent...”
“I first tried this back in the early dispensary days. This one is felt all over; from fingertips to toes. Not much on top, but not bad for zoning out after dinner.”

“Great strain, listen to music and fuck when you're high on this.

You're most definitely going to fall asleep because of it at some point though so be aware of that.”
“Not my favorite-- the taste is too earthy for me -- but it gets the job done if you need to sleep. Very powerful-- a little goes a long way.”

“Its ok if you are a novice smoker or new grower. I would cross it with some other strain. In Vancouver, they have crossed BIG BUD with NL#5 and its called Baldy". I think that Baldy is better due to the high THC you get from NL#5. The result is an Indica/Sativa mix with a nice high. I then crossed it with some heavy duty Jamaican Sativa seeds I brought back from Negril. The result has been an extremely potent spacey...”"

“this strain is mostly just a couch lock with the main effect being hunger. It's a good strain for anyone who isn't interested in the whole mental stimulation aspect but still strives for the body high or the relaxation without the paranoia.”

“I love big bud. I'm still a relatively new cannabis smoker, but I've tried several strains of different varieties to know what's good and what's not. This will make you very tired, but it's a buzzy, happy high. Tastes better than most weed I've had, and smokes well. Hits you hard and fast, and gives you a great night of sleep.”
“Grown critical mass the next generation of Big Bud.  Great yield but customers grew sick of it very quick. Not for me”

“the strain seems to get abit of stick for not having a wow factor but i believe all round it's a decent strain. strong, amazing yields , dense buds and doesn't have the odour of cheese at first glance but when you crack one of those buds the aroma is lovely. good for the inconspicuous  grower looking for large yields.”
“Not a bad strain. Gives a decent high but it isnt the best. good bud in general though”
“Wow!! I am thoroughly impressed with this strain! Very mellow and relaxing. Super happy with this end to my Friday... Chillin out to my favorite show and warm blanket. A new fave routine. 💚💚💚”

“I got this strain in a shatter and I loved it. It has great calming effects with our making you too sleepy. After about an hour or two of a very comfortable body high I drifted off to sleep and rested amazing. I just about murdered my fridge, this strain gave me super munchies”

“I couldn't find any afghani so gave this a try. A little bit of a delay smoking it but then a very nice relaxing buzz. I've tried other afghani variants like blueberry and wasn't impressed. This is probably my second favorite strain behind afghani. A good pain releiver and sleeper!”
“probably some of the best I've ever smoked. definitely a pick-me-up.”

“this is nonthing special.  regs   mid grade at most”
